text: @NYGovCuomo Governor Cuomo openly questions why the New York Times and other media outlets  were not sounding the alarm back in December about the coronavirus. I know why… the Democrats and mainstream media had everyone laser-focused on the ridiculous impeachment farce. Nice job Democrats.
